verses.translation: Tẽngã sã n wa rĩms a rĩms-kεgengã.
Tɩ ninsaalã yeele "yaa bõe n tar-a?"
Ad fo Soabã n lεεms-a woto.

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
verses.translation: Ra-kãngã, nebã yita kõbg toor-toore, tɩ b na n wilg-b b tʋʋmã.

verses.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Rẽnd ned ning sẽn wa n tʋm-a sẽn paood to-to fãa, tɩ yaa sõma, a yãt-a lame.

verses.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: La ned ning sẽn wa n tʋm-a sẽn paood to-to fãa, tɩ yaa wẽnga, a yãt-a lame
